Literature.Title: Mimicking Nonribosomal Peptides from the Marine Actinomycete Streptomyces sp. H-KF8 Leads to Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Beyer LI, Schäfer AB, Undabarrena A, Mattsby-Baltzer I, Tietze D, Svensson E, Stubelius A, Wenzel M, Cámara B, Tietze AA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MBC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>512µg/ml),Escherichia coli CCUG 31246(MBC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli CCUG 31246(MIC=>512µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 64549(MBC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 64549(MIC=>512µg/ml)
